GV01rvpp_06u:1490: vi | dveṣāṃsi | inuhi | vardhaya | iḷām | madema | śata-himāḥ | su-vīrāḥ // RV_6,10.7 //
GV01rvpp_06u:1550: adidyutat | su | apākaḥ | vi-bhāvā | agne | yajasva | rodasī iti | urūcī iti | /
GV01rvpp_06u:1551: āyum | na | yam | namasā | rāta-havyāḥ | añjanti | su-prayasam | pañca | janāḥ // RV_6,11.4 //
GV01rvpp_06u:2287: tvam | agne | yajñānām | hotā | viśveṣām | hitaḥ | devebhiḥ | mānuṣe | jane // RV_6,16.1 //
GV01rvpp_06u:2310: tvām | īḷe | adha | dvitā | bharataḥ | vāji-bhiḥ | śunam | īje | yajñeṣu | yajñiyam // RV_6,16.4 //
GV01rvpp_06u:2311: tvam | imā | vāryā | puru | divaḥ-dāsāya | sunvate | bharat-vājāya | dāśuṣe // RV_6,16.5 //
GV01rvpp_06u:2324: tvām | agne | su-ādhyaḥ | martāsaḥ | deva-vītaye | yajñeṣu | devam | īḷate // RV_6,16.7 //
GV01rvpp_06u:2345: agne | ā | yāhi | vītaye | gṛṇānaḥ | havya-dātaye | ni | hotā | satsi | barhiṣi // RV_6,16.10 //
GV01rvpp_06u:2357: saḥ | naḥ | pṛthu | śravāyyam | accha | deva | vivāsasi | bṛhat | agne | su-vīryam // RV_6,16.12 //
GV01rvpp_06u:2424: ā | agniḥ | agāmi | bhārataḥ | vṛtra-hā | puru-cetanaḥ | divaḥ-dāsasya | sat-patiḥ // RV_6,16.19 //
GV01rvpp_06u:2480: vasvī | te | agne | sam-dṛṣṭiḥ | iṣa-yate | martyāya | ūrjaḥ | napāt | amṛtasya // RV_6,16.25 //
GV01rvpp_06u:2562: bharat-vājāya | sa-prathaḥ | śarma | yaccha | sahantya | agne | vareṇyam | vasu // RV_6,16.33 //
GV01rvpp_06u:2592: upa | tvā | raṇva-sandṛśam | prayasvantaḥ | sahaḥ-kṛta | agne | sasṛjmahe | giraḥ // RV_6,16.37 //
GV01rvpp_06u:2593: upa | chāyām-iva | ghṛṇeḥ | aganma | śarma | te | vayam | agne | hiraṇya-sandṛśaḥ // RV_6,16.38 //
GV01rvpp_06u:2627: ā | jātam | jāta-vedasi | priyam | śiśīta | atithim | syone | ā | gṛha-patim // RV_6,16.42 //
GV01rvpp_06u:2639: accha | naḥ | yāhi | ā | vaha | abhi | prayāṃsi | vītaye | ā | devān | soma-pītaye // RV_6,16.44 //
GV01rvpp_06u:2640: uu | agne | bhārata | dyu-mat | ajasreṇa | davidyutat | śoca | vi | bhāhi | ajara // RV_6,16.45 //
GV01rvpp_06u:2965: ayā | vājam | deva-hitam | sanema | madema | śata-himāḥ | su-vīrāḥ // RV_6,17.15 //
GV01rvpp_06u:7052: tvam | ekasya | vṛtra-han | avitā | dvayoḥ | asi | uta | īdṛśe | yathā | vayam // RV_6,45.5 //
GV01rvpp_06u:7074: yasya | viśvāni | hastayoḥ | ūcuḥ | vasūni | ni | dvitā | vīrasya | pṛtanāsahaḥ // RV_6,45.8 //
GV01rvpp_06u:7075: vi | dṛḷhāni | cit | adri-vaḥ | janānām | sacī-pate | vṛha | māyāḥ | anānata // RV_6,45.9 //
GV01rvpp_06u:7176: pratnam | rayīṇām | yujam | sakhāyam | kīri-codanam | brahma-vāhaḥ-tamam | huve // RV_6,45.19 //
GV01rvpp_06u:7281: puru-tamam | purūṇām | stotṝṇām | vi-vāci | vājebhiḥ | vāja-yatām // RV_6,45.29 //
GV01rvpp_06u:7707: iti | upa | stheyāma | śaraṇā | bṛhantā // RV_6,47.8 //
GV01rvpp_06u:7978: mahi | rādhaḥ | viśva-janyam | dadhānān | bharat-vājān | sañjaryaḥ | abhi | ayaṣṭa // RV_6,47.25 //
GV01rvpp_06u:9403: viśve | devāḥ | ṛta-vṛdhaḥ | ṛtu-bhiḥ | havana-śrutaḥ | juṣantām | yujyam | payaḥ // RV_6,52.10 //
GV01rvpp_06u:9537: abhi | naḥ | naryam | vasu | vīram | prayata-dakṣiṇam | vāmam | gṛha-patim | naya // RV_6,53.2 //
GV01rvpp_06u:9560: pari | tṛndhipaṇīnām | ārayā | hṛdayā | kave | atha | īm | asmabhyam | randhaya // RV_6,53.5 //
GV01rvpp_06u:9598: yā | te | aṣṭrā | go--opaśā | āghṛṇe | paśu-sādhanī | tasyāḥ | te | sumnam | īmahe // RV_6,53.9 //
GV01rvpp_06u:9673: pūṣan | anu | pra | gāḥ | ihi | yajamānasya | sunvataḥ | asmākam | stuvatām | uta // RV_6,54.6 //
GV01rvpp_06u:9686: śṛṇvantam | pūṣaṇam | vayam | iryam | anaṣṭa-vedasam | īśānam | rāyaḥ | īmahe // RV_6,54.8 //
GV01rvpp_06u:9725: rathi-tamam | kapardinam | īśānam | rādhasaḥ | mahaḥ | rāyaḥ | sakhāyam | īmahe // RV_6,55.2 //
GV01rvpp_06u:9726: rāyaḥ | dhārā | asi | āghṛṇe | vasoḥ | rāśiḥ | aja-aśva | dhīvataḥ-dhīvataḥ | sakhā // RV_6,55.3 //
GV01rvpp_06u:9727: pūṣaṇam | nu | aja-aśvam | upa | stoṣāma | vājinam | svasuḥ | yaḥ | jāraḥ | ucyate // RV_6,55.4 //
GV01rvpp_06u:9751: yaḥ | enam | ādideśati | karambha-at | iti | pūṣaṇam | na | tena | devaḥ | ādiśe // RV_6,56.1 //
GV01rvpp_06u:9809: indrā | nu | pūṣaṇā | vayam | sakhyāya | svastaye | huvema | vāja-sātaye // RV_6,57.1 //
GV01rvpp_06u:9851: ut | pūṣaṇam | yuvāmahe | abhīśūn-iva | sārathiḥ | mahyai | indram | svastaye // RV_6,57.6 //
GV01rvpp_06u:10138: ugrā | vi-ghaninā | mṛdhaḥ | indrāgnī iti | havāmahe | tā | naḥ | mṛḷātaḥ | īdṛśe // RV_6,60.5 //
GV01rvpp_06u:10151: indrāgnī iti | yuvām | ime | abhi | stomāḥ | anūṣata | pibatam | śam-bhuvā | sutam // RV_6,60.7 //
GV01rvpp_06u:10185: yaḥ | iddhe | āvivāsati | sumnam | indrasya | martyaḥ | dyumnāya | su-tarāḥ | apaḥ // RV_6,60.11 //
GV01rvpp_06u:10291: pra | naḥ | devī | sarasvatī | vājebhiḥ | vājinī-vatī | dhīnām | avitrī | avatu // RV_6,61.4 //
GV01rvpp_06u:10292: yaḥ | tvā | devi | sarasvati | upa-brūte | dhane | hite | indram | na | vṛtra-tūyer // RV_6,61.5 //
GV01rvpp_06u:10295: tvam | devi | sarasvati | ava | vājeṣu | vājini | rada | pūṣāiva | naḥ | sanim // RV_6,61.6 //
GV01rvpp_06u:10305: yasyāḥ | anantaḥ | ahutaḥ | tveṣaḥ | cariṣṇuḥ | arṇavaḥ | amaḥ | carati | roruvat // RV_6,61.8 //
GV01rvpp_06u:10317: uta | naḥ | priyā | priyāsu | sapta-svasā | su-juṣṭā | sarasvatī | stomyā | bhūt // RV_6,61.10 //
GV01rvpp_06u:10320: āpapruṣī | pārthivāni | uru | rajaḥ | antarikṣam | sarasvatī | nidaḥ | pātu // RV_6,61.11 //
GV01rvpp_06u:10755: ā | vām | sumne | variman | sūri-bhiḥ | syām // RV_6,63.11 //
GV01rvpp_06u:11849: iti | viśva-śambhuvā | sanim | vājam | rayim | asme iti | sam | invatām // RV_6,70.6 //
